comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: louisperkins20: We are glad you are enjoying these photographs. We have not colorized or enhanced the images which were digitized from original Kodachrome color transparencies. Take a look under "Technical information" in our FAQ for more details: www.loc.gov/rr/print/flickr_pilot_faq.html#alter You can also read more about FSA/OWI color photographs here: www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/fsac/background.html and in a Library of Congress book, "Bound for Glory": www.loc.gov/wiseguide/jun04/glory.html
